description: Try our easy to follow My Chocolate Valentine recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: My Chocolate Valentine Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place a cake on a serving plate, place chocolate cream into a piping bag fitted with a 1.5cm round nozzle; pipe cream along the top of the cake, top with a PLAISTOWE Premium Milk Chocolate rectangle and arrange 1 raspberry on top and garnish with gold leaf; repeat with remaining cake. Serve.
